title: Backend API Development
description:
Develop RESTful APIs with authentication, user management, and core business logic for the freelancer platform including:

• User authentication endpoints (register, login, logout)
• User profile management APIs
• Job posting and search functionality
• Proposal submission system
• Database schema with proper relationships
• JWT token-based security
• Input validation and error handling
• API documentation with Swagger

Deliverables:
• Complete REST API implementation
• Database migrations and seed data
• Postman collection for testing
• API documentation
• Unit tests with >80% coverage
• Docker containerization

Acceptance Criteria:
• All APIs return proper HTTP status codes
• Authentication flow works end-to-end
• Database queries are optimized
• Error responses follow consistent format
• Performance: APIs respond within 200ms
• Security: No sensitive data in logs
• Code review completed and approved
